A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While The Last Jedi wasn't what I was expecting\, I did enjoy it and thought it was a really good movie. It was a little different than most other Star Wars movies but to me that just makes unique. That doesn't take away from the enjoyment of watching it. There are some questions that I would have liked to have seen answered. They might answer them in the next one if possible. Only time will tell.
